text_block_list.text:
We had escaped from that downward spiral. 
After 3 months of rest――it was March of the new year
Finally, the signal for a new beginning rang out.

text_block_list.name: Rhein Kraft
text_block_list.text: Yaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaa!

text_block_list.name: Announcer
text_block_list.text:
It's a 6 furlong battle at the 『Takamatsunomiya Kinen』! 
Rhein Kraft runs and runs!

text_block_list.name: Announcer
text_block_list.text:
A closely contested 2nd place! But, today's run is completely 
different from last year! Everyone's been waiting for this!

text_block_list.name: Rhein Kraft
text_block_list.text: It was so close～! But, I've been able to come this far……!

text_block_list.name: Rhein Kraft
text_block_list.text: 2nd place at the 『Takamatsunomiya Kinen』 that King-san won!

text_block_list.name: King Halo
text_block_list.text: Trainer, that run was……
Yeah, Kraft is back!
Yeah, Kraft is back!

The 『Takamatsunomiya Kinen』 is a 1200m G1. It's not 
her strongest distance, 1600m, but to come this far……

text_block_list.name: Rhein Kraft
text_block_list.text:
(I won't waver anymore. 
I want――this light to reach everyone!)

text_block_list.name: Rhein Kraft
text_block_list.text:
(Even if it's not as much as an Undefeated Triple Crown, 
I'll work my hardest so that this shine can reach them)
And then, it was April. The G2 『Hanshin Uma Musume Stakes』

text_block_list.name: Rhein Kraft
text_block_list.text:
Trainer-san, King-san. Thanks to both of you, 
I was able to stand back up again! But, I'm……

text_block_list.name: Rhein Kraft
text_block_list.text:
Still weak. It's still not enough…… 
That's why I still haven't won in almost a year.

It's true you haven't won, but……even then, 
your feelings haven't changed, right?

It's true you haven't won, but……even then, 
your feelings haven't changed, right?

text_block_list.name: Rhein Kraft
text_block_list.text:
Yes! I want to do my best to reach out. 
To the future!

text_block_list.name: King Halo
text_block_list.text:
Yeah, yeah, as long as you keep trying, 
you'll definitely get results!

text_block_list.name: Daring Heart
text_block_list.text:
Hi, Kraft! Looks like you're feeling better now. 
Today's an all-stars battle isn't it?

text_block_list.name: Rhein Kraft
text_block_list.text:
Yeah! Sorry about that, Heart-san, Messiah-san! 
I made you worry.

text_block_list.name: Rhein Kraft
text_block_list.text:
I won't look down anymore! 
I've already decided to do everything I can!

text_block_list.name: Air Messiah
text_block_list.text:
I see……seems like Kraft is different this year. 
I'm looking forward to today.

text_block_list.name: Rhein Kraft
text_block_list.text: ――Yeah!

text_block_list.name: Sweep Tosho
text_block_list.text: ……make sure you don't mess this up, Kraft.

text_block_list.name: King Halo
text_block_list.text: Trainer……
It's fine. Let's just believe in her.
It's fine. Let's just believe in her.

It was Rhein Kraft's revival. 
And what was necessary for that――was "Victory".

Obtaining a victory would be proof of a 
comeback to both her rivals and her fans.

text_block_list.name: Rhein Kraft
text_block_list.text:
――I'll do it. This isn't the end of my road. 
I'll just make it myself!

text_block_list.name: Rhein Kraft
text_block_list.text:
Trainer-san, just wait for me at the goal. 
I'll do it for sure!

text_block_list.name: Announcer
text_block_list.text:
And now all the Uma Musume are in position. 
The 『Hanshin Uma Musume S』――now begins!!
